page.title: 06Stowmarket Population
page.content: The population of Stowmarket is 10,910.Since 1901 there has been a 162% increase from 4162 and the fastest growth has been in the last decade with a 25.7% growth.Between 1901 and 1931 there was a 3.25% increase and since 1951 there has been a 50% increase,reflecting the growing population in the whole of Suffolk.The other Parish is Stowupland which has a population of 1,910 with a 78% increase in the last decade.Because of the war though there has only been a total 43% increase since 1901.Many people have migrated to Stowmarket in the last decade.In a recent survey of a typical housing estate only 28 out of 184 people had always lived in Stowmarket and only 78 actually originated in East Anglia.
